title: Game Crashes After Clicking Launch
body: Was wondering if anyone else was having issues? I played 2 days ago just perfectly but yesterday i tried to play and nothing so i let it repair then didnt have time to play so i tried to play today and noting still very frustrating. Tried to repair the client now and also run as admin neither one worked so any help would be greatly appreciated.

replies.body: I'd like to help, but I'm really not sure what you mean when you say crash.  When exactly is that happening and what do you see?  Are there any error messages?  Let me know!
